alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Western San Fernando Valley; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 04 at 9:09AM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the mountains and valleys of southwest California. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
